content: thin gold ribbon for hangar a spring green 0672 b soft white 0316 c cherry red 0319 d charcoal 3950 one ball of each will make about 20 jolly pickles > german legend has it that the > christmas pickle was the last ornament > hung on the tree and the first child > to find the pickle got an extra > present whether you follow tradition > or just love pickles you ll enjoy > knitting this happy face ornament to > have each christmas season
